Articles.Content: Also added gold reflective visor and new KSP decals
Someone should make a leaky suit.. That would be fun.. Maybe some panicking type facial expressions....
Is it possible for the reflective visor to only cover half of the face, just the eyes? The whole thing looks a little too... Well, awesome, but also, like, scary......

Is it possible for the reflective visor to only cover half of the face, just the eyes? The whole thing looks a little too... Well, awesome, but also, like, scary......

I have been developing a few different coloured visors. I gave this a quick try to be sure and the short answer is no. Squads texture UV mapping uses symmetry meaning the weird look and the fact is a semi closed visor means it would appear on the bottom as well

Edited March 9, 2014 by Green Skull
tried solution

Someone should make a leaky suit.. That would be fun.. Maybe some panicking type facial expressions....

Maybe I'll put in some bullet holes in the Jokers Spacesuit when I get around to doing it I can try for some more expressive faces too.

Please remember guys these are the first versions so I will need reports back. Things can only get better from here! (Hopefully).

Seriously these are the first versions of the textures and are still all WIP. Although some of the textures look basic as a flat picture its on the game character that counts!

I know this pack is evolving constantly, but for those of us watching with anticipation, can we get an "alpha" version of this patch so far. Of course I would update as you provide newer versions. I would love to start using what you have so far though.

For your consideration, I made a flag pack (Airogue Flag Pack v.1), and I was going to wait to release but your project made me want to release what I have now. Currently I have 75 flags in the zip, and if I too get requests I will knock out some more. Many would make excellent patches for your suits. I played with it already on the stock EVA suit and Photoshop. We use them as modern morale patches in the military and as I look at your screen shots my mind races with excitement ;-)

If you like them you are more than welcome to include them in with your pack as well. They may even inspire a new space suit or two (maybe Black Beard's flag, and a rugged Pirate space suit haha). Anyways, keep up the great work.

Airogue

Flag pack: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/airogueflagpackv1/
